Title: An Act Converting the Calasiao National High School in the Municipality of Calasiao, Province of Pangasinan, into a Comprehensive National High School to be Known as the Calasiao Comprehensive National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 180
An Act Converting the Calasiao National High School in the Municipality of Calasiao, Province of Pangasinan, into a Comprehensive National High School to be Known as the Calasiao Comprehensive National High School
Section 1. The Calasiao National High School in the Municipality of Calasiao, Province of Pangasinan, is hereby converted into a comprehensive national high school to be known as the Calasiao Comprehensive National High School. Said school shall offer general secondary curriculum, vocational curriculum and other technological courses.
Section 2. The amount of the one hundred fifty thousand pesos for the operation of the school shall be charged to the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 80 for the Ministry of Education and Culture intended for new national schools. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be provided for in the annual General Appropriations Act.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1Ã¢wphi1
Approved: March 5, 1982
